files.patch:
@@ -359,3 +359,3 @@
-    return "Print all platform threads with stacktraces. "
-           "Use Thread.dump_to_file command for extended threads "
-            "detail including virtual thread information.";
+    return "Print all platform threads, and mounted virtual threads, "
+           "with stack traces. The Thread.dump_to_file command will "
+           "print all threads to a file.";
@@ -773,1 +773,1 @@
-    return "Dump threads (including virtual), with stack traces, "
+    return "Dump all threads, with stack traces, "

@@ -707,1 +707,1 @@
-:   Dump threads (including virtual), with stack traces, to a file in plain text or JSON format.
+:   Dump all threads, with stack traces, to a file in plain text or JSON format.
@@ -726,2 +726,2 @@
-:   Print all platform threads with stacktraces. Use Thread.dump_to_file command
-    for extended threads detail including virtual thread information.
+:   Print all platform threads, and mounted virtual threads, with stack traces.
+    The Thread.dump_to_file command will print all threads to a file.
